item.title: FaceOverlay
item.description:
Intro FaceOverlay (also known as SmileyCluster ) is an educational tool for machine learning under development in Dr. Zhen Bai’s lab at the University of Rochester. I was able to work on the project through an NSF-funded internship over the summer of 2019. Dr. Bai and her lab were amazing to work with and I learned a lot about iterative design and experiment design through that experience.
UR’s Rush Rhees Library ↑ Chernoff Faces Chernoff Faces are a tool for visualizing multivariate data.
